sentences.sContent: When I asked the solitary stewardess if she could clean the floor so I could place my purse on it, she said flippantly, “Oh, I’m not going to clean it, what can I tell you, it’s a plane.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I asked the solitary stewardess if she could clean the floor so I could place my purse on it, she said flippantly, “Oh, I’m not going to clean it, what can I tell you, it’s a plane.
sentences.sCn: 当我问及那个仅有的服务员，是否可以把地板擦一擦好让我能发一下包时。 她毫不礼貌的说：“嗷，我不打算那么做，我得告诉你这是在飞机上。

synos.tran: 女管家；女干事；[劳经][交]女服务员

phrases.pCn: 空中小姐（空姐）；空中服务员

words.tran: 管家；乘务员；膳务员；工会管事
管理工作；管事人的职位及职责

trans.tranOther: a woman whose job is to serve food and drinks to passengers on a plane or ship
